AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa: Defendant who pleaded guilty to charges of illegal re-entry after deportation, native and citizen of Mexico
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Plea Agreement between Rogelio Valero-De: Agreement outlining terms of guilty plea, including waiver of right to collaterally attack conviction or sentence
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Mexico: Country of origin for Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: Country where Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa was found after illegal re-entry
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Brownsville, Texas: Location where Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa was previously removed from the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo, Texas: Location where Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa was found in the United States after illegal re-entry
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Attorney General: Official responsible for granting permission to re-enter the United States after removal
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Secretary of the Department of Homeland: Official responsible for granting permission to re-enter the United States after removal
